name: ChristmasFireplace
0:
”Alexa, open christmas fireplace”
”Alexa start christmas fireplace”
”Alexa launch christmas fireplace”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas fireplace
des: Welcome the holiday spirit into your home with Nature Sound Retreat's "Christmas Fireplace" Alexa skill. Immerse yourself in the cozy ambience of crackling logs and soft, warm glows, perfect for a relaxing evening, peaceful sleep, or focused studying sessions. With 'Christmas Fireplace,' transform any moment into a serene retreat or a productive study nook, all with a simple voice command. Discover the magic of a festive atmosphere and let relaxation be your gift this season."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
